info.name: Validate Relationship Service Sandbox 07/03/25
info.description:
Example usage of the Validate Relationship Service (VRS) sandbox.

Full specification is available at [https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service)

request.description: Example of an adult to child access request with the reference code returned

item.name: Adult to adult with ability to consent access request

item.name: Get verified candidate relationship (Related Person)

request.description: Retrieves a list of validated relationships for a given NHS number.

item.name: List relationship and include patient's details

request.description: Retrieves a list of validated relationships for a given NHS number with additional patient information.

item.name: List Relationship and no relationships returned

request.description: Example of a response where the given NHS numbers do not have a relationship.

item.name: Verify relationship between proxy and patient

request.description: Retrieves information about the relationship between the given NHS numbers

item.name: Verify relationship between proxy and patient and include patient's details

request.description: Retrieves information about the relationship between the given NHS numbers including the patient details

item.description:
# Get proxy relationships (consent)

The GET /Consent is for retrieving confirmed proxy relationships via the Validated Relationships Service.

This folder contains requests covering different scenarios for users with different types of proxy relationship. Also includes error scenarios.

For more details please see the [OAS page for Validated Relationships Service consent on the NHS England website.](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service#get-/Consent)

item.name: Create proxy relationship (Consent)

"display": "Request must be for a new proxy role.",

item.description:
# Create proxy relationships (consent)

The POST /Consent is for storing confirmed proxy relationships via the Validated Relationships Service.

This folder contains requests covering different scenarios for users with different types of proxy relationship. Also includes error scenarios.

For more details please see the [OAS page for Validated Relationships Service consent on the NHS England website.](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service#get-/Consent)
